content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position 0,0 and 2,0)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing iron plates:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel (16), processing iron ore (8) into iron plates (2)
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel (17), processing iron ore (8) into iron plates (2)
Both furnaces are actively working

### Copper Plate Production (Position 4,4 and 6,4)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing copper plates:
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) with coal fuel (22), processing copper ore (9) into copper plates (2)
- Furnace 4 at (6,4) with coal fuel (23), processing copper ore (9) into copper plates (2)
Both furnaces are actively working

### Power Generation System (Position -7.5, 18.5)
Complete power generation setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (-7.5, 18.5), working status, containing 200 steam at 165°
- Boiler at (-7.5, 22.0), currently out of fuel, containing water (200) and steam (153)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5), working status, containing water (100)
- Connected pipe groups:
  - Steam pipes at (-7.5, 15.5)
  - Empty pipes at (-7.5, 20.5)
  - Water pipes at (-8.5, 23.5)

### Power Distribution Network
Extensive power pole network operating at 996kV, connecting multiple areas including:
- Poles at (7.5, 7.5), (-4.5, 9.5), (7.5, 17.5)
- Additional poles at (3.5, 6.5), (3.5, 7.5), (4.5, 7.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Research and Technology Issues
- Use correct technology names: 'logistic-science-pack' instead of 'LogisticSciencePack'
- Verify technology prerequisites before researching (Logistics 2 and Electric Energy Distribution require logistic science packs)
- Cannot research advanced technologies without required prerequisites

### Lab Location and Access Issues
- Lab positions are not being found correctly - verify lab coordinates before attempting access
- Ensure lab search area matches actual lab placement
- Implement better lab discovery mechanism as current search is not finding any labs

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler - currently running out of fuel
- Keep track of coal in inventory before attempting to insert into boiler
- Maintain consistent fuel supply to prevent power generation interruptions

### Entity Access Errors
- Verify entity existence before attempting to access or modify
- Check for correct entity positioning when searching for specific entities
- Use correct prototype naming and entity references

### API Usage Errors
- Use correct prototype names when accessing recipes and entities
- Handle missing entities gracefully when searching or accessing
- Verify entity existence before attempting operations
